item.title: 托尼·吴成为最新一位离开马斯克初创公司的xAI联合创始人
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克旗下人工智能初创公司xAI的联合创始人之一托尼·吴，在任职不到三年后即将离职——这使他成为近期离职的又一位创始成员。【原文：Tony Wu, one of the co-founders of Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI, is leaving the company after less than three years — making him the latest in a string of founding members who have departed.】

item.title: 更多加拿大航空公司因燃油短缺暂停飞往古巴航班
item.description: 加拿大另外两家航空公司——西捷航空有限公司和Transat AT公司——宣布因古巴岛上航空燃油短缺，将暂时暂停飞往古巴的航班服务。【原文：Two more Canadian carriers, WestJet Airlines Ltd. and Transat AT Inc., announced temporary suspensions of service to Cuba due to aviation fuel shortages on the island.】

item.title: 梵蒂冈银行推出基于天主教价值观的股票指数
item.description: 梵蒂冈银行推出了两只股票指数，这些指数依据天主教原则来选择股票。【原文：The Vatican Bank has launched two equity indexes that choose stocks on the basis of Catholic principles.】

item.title: 银行家着手处理大众汽车旗下Everllence部门65亿欧元债务
item.description: 银行家们正积极筹措高达65亿欧元（77亿美元）的融资，以支持大众汽车集团旗下重型柴油发动机部门Everllence SE的多数股权潜在出售事宜。【原文：Bankers are drumming up interest for as much as €6.5 billion ($7.7 billion) of financing to back the potential sale of a majority stake in Volkswagen AG’s heavy diesel-engine unit Everllence SE.】

item.title: 风投公司对患者权益技术公司Solace Health估值达10亿美元
item.description: 面对美国医疗体系复杂难解的困境，人们对医疗导航服务的迫切需求推动初创企业Solace Health估值突破10亿美元——该公司为患者提供医疗倡导服务，协助预约就诊、解读治疗方案并理解医疗账单。【原文：The demand for help navigating the famously complex US health care system has propelled a startup called Solace Health to a $1 billion valuation — offering health advocacy for people trying to schedule appointments, interpret treatment plans and understand medical bills.】

item.title: Cadence力推人工智能加速设计进程，应对人才短缺困境
item.description: 新思科技公司推出一款新型人工智能工具，可加速半导体设计进程。该公司认为，此类技术对于满足芯片需求、应对技术人才短缺至关重要。【原文：Cadence Design Systems Inc. is introducing a new AI tool that can help speed the design of semiconductors, arguing that such technology is necessary to keep up with demand for chips and cope with shortages of skilled labor.】

item.title: 麦肯锡将其200亿美元投资部门移交纽伯格
item.description: 麦肯锡公司同意将其200亿美元投资部门的控制权移交给纽伯格伯曼公司。此前数十年来，该咨询公司一直通过复杂的对冲基金和另类投资策略，为现任及前任合伙人管理着巨额资产。【原文：McKinsey & Co. agreed to hand control of its $20 billion investment arm to Neuberger Berman, after decades of managing the fortunes of the consulting firm’s current and former partners in sophisticated hedge fund and alternative strategies.】

item.title: 摩根大通策略师称对软件股的人工智能担忧被夸大
item.description: 摩根大通策略师指出，由于市场对人工智能短期内造成颠覆性影响的预期过于夸大，软件股有望从历史性跌势中反弹。【原文：Software stocks have the scope to rebound from their historic slide as the market is pricing in unrealistic near-term disruption from artificial intelligence, according to JPMorgan strategists.】

item.title: 金融科技公司Agibank在美股IPO前数小时大幅下调发行价与规模
item.description: 在竞争对手PicS NV股价暴跌20%之际，Agi公司于美国首次公开募股（IPO）启动前数小时，将发行价格区间下调并大幅缩减计划规模，新股发行规模较原计划缩减一半。【原文：Agi Inc. lowered the price range and slashed the planned size of its initial public offering in the US by half just hours ahead of the sale amid a 20% drop in shares of competitor PicS NV.】

item.title: 特朗普移民政策将拖累汇款，比索承压
item.description: 唐纳德·特朗普的移民政策收紧以及墨西哥比索的快速升值，正通过减缓资金流入该国的速度，给墨西哥经济带来额外压力。【原文：Donald Trump’s immigration crackdown and the fast-strengthening peso are putting additional pressure on Mexico’s economy by slowing the flow of money into the country.】

item.title: 英镑债券发售中，Alphabet百年期债券需求最旺
item.description: 字母表公司（Alphabet Inc.）发售的10亿英镑（14亿美元）超稀有百年期债券，认购订单量接近发行额的十倍。这笔标志性交易凸显了在债务驱动下，各国竞相争夺人工智能霸权的激烈态势。【原文：Alphabet Inc. has received close to ten times orders for a £1 billion ($1.4 billion) sale of an ultra rare 100-year bond, a landmark transaction in the debt-fueled race for artificial intelligence supremacy.】

item.title: 卡塔尔液化天然气增长面临长期销售计划考验
item.description: 海湾国家需要敲定更多供应协议，以跟上预期产能扩张的步伐。【原文：The Gulf nation needs to clinch more supply deals to keep pace with expected capacity expansion.】

item.title: 欧洲议会支持线上线下数字欧元
item.description: 欧洲议会支持发行线上和线下的数字欧元——这打破了该议题主要立法者仅发行后者的提案。【原文：The European Parliament supported issuing an online and offline digital euro – breaking with a proposal by the leading lawmaker on the topic to only create the latter.】

item.title: 万豪业绩未达预期，停摆冲击商务旅行
item.description: 万豪国际集团公布的第四季度财报未达预期，原因是去年美国政府停摆期间机场延误抑制了商务旅行需求。【原文：Marriott International Inc. reported fourth-quarter earnings that missed expectations, after airport delays during last year’s US government shutdown put a damper on business travel.】

item.title: 马克龙守护法国央行黄金机遇
item.description: 法国央行突发辞职事件预示七国集团央行将迎来新旧交替【原文：A surprise resignation at the Bank of France augurs a changing of the guard at G-7 central banks】

item.title: 巴西通胀加速，令三月降息幅度蒙上阴影
item.description: 巴西1月份通胀率有所上升，这强化了市场预期：在准备降息之际，巴西央行将采取谨慎行动。【原文：Brazil’s inflation picked up in January, bolstering expectations that the Central Bank will move cautiously as it prepares to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 维勒罗伊离职引爆法国央行行长之争
item.description: 弗朗索瓦·维勒鲁瓦·德加洛卸任法国央行行长一职，在敏感时期为该国及整个地区留下关键职位空缺。【原文：Francois Villeroy de Galhau’s exit as Bank of France governor creates a pivotal vacancy for both the country and the region at a sensitive time.】

item.title: 安德森·霍洛维茨对特朗普时期人工智能政策日益增长的影响力
item.description:
硅谷最富有的风险投资公司正成为推动人工智能最低限度的监管的"游说巨头"。【原文：

Silicon Valley’s richest venture capital firm emerges as a “lobbying juggernaut” for minimal AI regulation.

】

item.title: 津巴布韦与国际货币基金组织达成协议后，预计将实现14年来最快经济增长
item.description: 津巴布韦财政与经济发展部长表示，该国与国际货币基金组织达成一项为期10个月的职员监督计划后，其经济增速有望达到14年来最高水平。【原文：Zimbabwe’s economy could grow at its fastest pace in 14 years after the nation secured a 10-month staff-monitored program with the International Monetary Fund, its secretary for finance and economic development said.】

item.title: 新兴市场股票再度上涨，人工智能支出担忧缓解
item.description: 新兴市场股票升至1月30日以来的最高点，投资者押注人工智能驱动的涨势仍有进一步发展空间。【原文：Emerging-market stocks rose to the highest since Jan. 30 as investors bet the rally backed by artificial intelligence has more room to run.】

item.title: 交易商格林威治金属与元素阿尔法据悉正寻求合并
item.description: 据知情人士透露，格林威治金属公司与Element Alpha SA正就合并事宜进行最终磋商，此举将使这两家大宗商品交易商在关键市场中获得更大影响力。【原文：Greenwich Metals Inc. and Element Alpha SA are finalizing talks over a merger that would give the commodity traders greater heft in key markets, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴、腾讯和字节跳动推出AI红包吸引用户
item.description: 优惠券和补贴旨在增加用户数量【原文：Vouchers and subsidies aim to boost subscriber numbers】

item.title: 加拿大推进特朗普破坏的"基于规则"贸易
item.description: 随着美国竖起关税壁垒，加拿大正将自己塑造成贸易中的"可靠"伙伴。【原文：As the US erects tariff barriers, Canada is selling itself as a ‘reliable’ partner in trade】

item.title: 利宝互助保险公司将与专注净零排放的私募股权公司Ara建立合作伙伴关系
item.description: 利宝互助保险集团旗下资产管理公司同意支持Ara Partners的基础设施与能源投资策略，这是保险公司与另类投资机构之间最新建立的合作关系。【原文：Liberty Mutual Group Inc.’s asset-management arm agreed to back Ara Partners’ infrastructure and energy strategies, in the latest partnership between an insurer and an alternative investment firm.】

item.title: EEX讨论延长电力期货交易时间
item.description: 全球最大的电力交易所正就提前德国电力期货交易时间展开磋商。该期货是关键基准指标，此举或将惠及该所在日本快速增长的客户群。【原文：The world’s largest power exchange is in talks about an earlier morning start to trading in German power futures, a key benchmark, in a move that could benefit its rapidly growing client base in Japan.】

item.title: 法拉利乐观展望缓解投资者对需求的担忧
item.description: 法拉利公司发布了2026年新业绩指引，向投资者保证这家豪华汽车制造商有能力在重大产品转型期间维持增长和利润率。【原文：Ferrari NV issued new guidance for 2026 that reassured investors about the luxury carmaker’s ability to sustain growth and margins through a major product transition.】

item.title: Ares为Vantage数据中心达成24亿美元贷款协议
item.description: Ares Management Corp. 向 Vantage Data Centers 提供 24 亿美元债务融资，其中部分资金可能用于支持 Oracle 公司与 OpenAI 合作所需的基础设施建设。【原文：Ares Management Corp. is providing $2.4 billion of debt financing to Vantage Data Centers, part of which may be used to fund the build-out of infrastructure supporting Oracle Corp.’s partnership with OpenAI.】

item.title: 债券投资者押注谷歌再创百年辉煌
item.description:
Alphabet发售百年债券，这是自1997年以来科技公司首次发行此类债券。

【原文：

Alphabet’s sale of century bond is the first by a tech company since 1997.

】

item.title: 苹果、谷歌提出应用商店改革方案以消除英国竞争与市场管理局的担忧
item.description: 英国反垄断监管机构宣布，苹果公司和谷歌母公司Alphabet承诺对应用商店进行改革，以确保对开发者和消费者公平。这是英国根据其数字市场法规首次获得科技巨头的承诺。【原文：Apple Inc. and Alphabet Inc.’s Google committed to making app stores changes to ensure fairness to developers and consumers, the UK’s antitrust watchdog said announcing the first assurances from Big Tech firms under the country’s digital market rules.】

item.title: Spotify凭借"年度回顾"活动创下用户增长纪录
item.description: 瑞典音乐流媒体巨头Spotify Technology SA新增用户数远超分析师预期，创下单季度新增用户数最高纪录。【原文：Spotify Technology SA, the Swedish music streaming giant, signed up significantly more users than analysts expected, setting a corporate record for most users added in a single quarter.】
